item.title: Estonia seeks Nato consultation after Russian jets violate airspace
item.description: Nato intercepted three Russian MiG-31 fighter jets, which remained in Estonian airspace for 12 minutes on Friday.

item.title: British couple reunited with daughter after months held by Taliban
item.description: Family of Barbie, 76, and Peter Reynolds, 80, express "immense joy" as couple arrive in Qatar after being detained in Afghanistan.

item.title: Key oceans treaty crosses threshold to come into force
item.description: Sixty states have ratified a global treaty to protect the oceans - it will become law in January.

item.title: US forces strike third alleged drug vessel killing three, Trump says
item.description: Venezuela has condemned a series of strikes by US forces in the Caribbean targeting alleged drug traffickers.

item.title: Trump and Xi discuss future of TikTok in US
item.description: Trump said a deal had been approved but Chinese state media did not confirm that an agreement had been reached.
